sourcesContent: Home Home Welcome to CarLookup! Please input your cars VIN in the text field below to find all the information about it! VIN: Lookup! {{item.Variable}} {{item.Value}} import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { AlertController } from '@ionic/angular'; import { LoadingController } from '@ionic/angular'; import { DataService } from '../services/data.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-home', templateUrl: 'home.page.html', styleUrls: ['home.page.scss'], }) export class HomePage { name: string = ""; decodeVINUrl: string = "https://vpic.nhtsa.dot.gov/api/vehicles/DecodeVIN/"; fmt: string = "?format=json"; list: any; mydata: any; carinfo: any; constructor(private loadingCtrl: LoadingController, private alertController: AlertController, private dataService: DataService) {} getVIN() { if(this.name.length != 17) { console.log("ERROR!"); this.invalidVINAlert(); } else { var temp = this.decodeVINUrl + this.name + this.fmt; this.dataService.findVIN(temp).subscribe(data => { this.list = data; console.log(this.list); }); this.showVINLoading(); } } loadData() { this.mydata = this.list.Results; this.carinfo = this.mydata.splice(8,15); } async invalidVINAlert() { const alert = await this.alertController.create({ header: 'Invalid VIN', message: 'Please input a valid vin', buttons: [{ text: 'OK', }], }); await alert.present(); } async showVINLoading() { const loading = await this.loadingCtrl.create({ message: 'Finding VIN', duration: 1500, }); loading.present(); setTimeout(() => { this.loadData(); }, 1500) } }
